archetypes.name: Jack
archetypes.bio: Armored vanguard that anchors lanes and keeps foes busy with shields and taunts.
perks: Begins with bonus shields and slightly higher threat radius.

archetypes.name: Sally
archetypes.bio: Support caster who sustains allies and steadies fights when things snowball.
perks: Consumable cooldowns reduced slightly when healing allies.

archetypes.name: Robin
archetypes.bio: Flexible combatant who swaps stances to exploit enemy weaknesses.
perks: First dodge after swap has a brief haste window.

archetypes.name: Mar√≠a
archetypes.bio: High burst skirmisher relying on speed and positioning over armor.
perks: Critical hits briefly boost move speed.

archetypes.name: George
archetypes.bio: Deploys structures and mini-units to hold ground and farm resources.
perks: Starts with +1 supply and cheaper first structure.

archetypes.name: Gunther
archetypes.bio: Polearm specialist that controls space and buffs allies mid-line.
perks: Polearm sweeps have mild parry strength versus projectiles.

archetypes.name: Ellis
archetypes.bio: Experimental kit with balanced stats and light holy utility.
perks: Takes reduced damage during brief consecrate windows.

archetypes.name: Sage
archetypes.bio: Relies on beetle and serpent companions; fragile without them.
perks: Summons inherit a portion of Luck for drop chance.

archetypes.name: Raven
archetypes.bio: Shapeshifts between ranged human form and aggressive beast forms.
perks: Form swaps cleanse slows and grant brief regen pulses.

archetypes.name: Jade
archetypes.bio: Elementalist weaving fire and lightning to control the battlefield.
perks: Cycle bonus: first spell after element swap gains crit chance.
